thread.title: Twitter Reacts to DeVos Getting Confirmed as Secretary of Education
thread.title_full: Twitter Reacts to DeVos Getting Confirmed as Secretary of Education

title: Twitter Reacts to DeVos Getting Confirmed as Secretary of Education
text:
Twitter Reacts to DeVos Getting Confirmed as Secretary of Education Most Popular By Sally Holmes Feb 7, 2017 Betsy DeVos was just confirmed as Secretary of Education by the Senate in a historic vote that required Vice President Mike Pence to cast a tie-breaking ballot. Twitter was swift to react: For $200,000,000 you can have whatever job you want. 
— Zach Braff (@zachbraff) February 7, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below a terrible moment in US history to confirm such an incompetent person as #Devos a total rejection of logic or concern for education 
— Sandra Bernhard (@SandraBernhard) February 7, 2017 Most Popular America has a new Education Secretary who wants guns in schools to protect kids from Grizzly Bears - who've never attacked kids in schools. 
— Piers Morgan (@piersmorgan) February 7, 2017 Betsy DeVos nominated by razor-thin 51-50 vote, but Trump alleges as many as 3 million dead Senators may have voted illegally. 
— Tea Pain (@TeaPainUSA) February 7, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below One of these photos show who will destroy our education system, the other is a bear. #noDevos #devos pic.twitter.com/4RowItoGgD *devos applying for locksmith job*MANAGER: How would you pick this lock?DEVOS: Fire
